channel.title: Emad Mokhtar's Framework - Geeks
channel.description: Geek developer who's in search of code perfection.

item.title: Interesting paragraph in 7-Habits of Highly Effective People
item.description:
Yesterday when I was reading 7 Habits of high Effective People, I read extremely interesting paragraph in habit no 2 "Begin with the end in mind" which talk about work-centered people

The paragraph:

Work-centered people may become "workaholics" driving themselves to produce at the sacrifice of health, relationships, and other â€¦
item.dc:creator: EmadMokhtar
